Class CharBuf

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • groovy.json.internal.CharBuf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable, CharSequence

    public class CharBuf
extends Writer
implements CharSequence
